plot: On the 24th November 1995 Ireland held a referendum which could have removed it's constitutional ban on divorce. "Hearts and Souls" follows some of the leaders of the No to Divorce campaign.
title: Hearts and Souls
plot_es: On the 24th November 1995 Ireland held a referendum which could have removed it's constitutional ban on divorce. "Hearts and Souls" follows some of the leaders of the No to Divorce campaign.
plot_en: On the 24th November 1995 Ireland held a referendum which could have removed it's constitutional ban on divorce. "Hearts and Souls" follows some of the leaders of the No to Divorce campaign.
